# nextContentProposal

**Instance Property**

The item proposed to follow the current content.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var nextContentProposal: AVContentProposal? { get set }
```

## Discussion

You can use this property to associate content proposed to follow the current content.

## Configuring player items for AVKit

- **navigationMarkerGroups**: The time marker groups that provide ways to navigate the player item’s content.
